Desc.entry: A comprehensive and confidential NHS service provided for those requiring screening and the treatment of sexually transmitted infections. The care and management of other genital conditions, including that of HIV/AIDS, is a speciality. HIV testing is available on request with same day results on Tuesdays. All treatment is given free by appointment only (appointment available within 48 hours). Young Persons Clinic every Monday (term-time only, no appointment needed). Self or professional referral. Also provides information and advice. For wheelchair access a lift is available from B Floor to C Floor where the clinic is located.

DisabledAccess.entry: Changing Places Toilet available in this building

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 3.30-5.30pm (Young Persons Clinic), Mon, Tues, Thurs & Fri 9-11.45am, 2-3.30pm; Wed 9-11.45am, 2-3.30pm (for asymptomatic screening service); Sat 9-11.30am (emergencies only)
